name: More of the Worst Movies Ever Online Trivia | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'The Green Berets' provided John Wayne's point of view on Viet Nam. Who co-starred in the movie?
questions.explanation:
David Janssen.

	He played a reporter, I believe. Definitely not a great movie.

questions.text: 'Bonfire of the Vanities' was a hit novel, but a dud movie. Who was the author?
questions.explanation:
Tom Wolfe.

	The movie starred Tom Hanks. The transition from book to movie isn't always successful.

questions.text: 'At Long Last Love' died at the box office. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Burt Reynolds.

	A musical with Cybill Shepherd.

questions.text: 'Hudson Hawk' was also a flop. Who was the star?
Another movie that died involved a character named 'Howard'. What was he?
'Hair' was a great show on Broadway, but the movie version didn't cut it. Who was the director?
questions.explanation:
Milos Forman.

	The difference was like day and night.

questions.text: 'Stop or My Mom Will Shoot' was apparently every bit as weak as its title suggests. The star was Sylvester Stallone; who played 'Mom'?
questions.explanation:
Estelle Getty.

	Did Stallone ever do a successful comedy?

questions.text: 'The Nude Bomb' speaks for itself. It involved a TV person moving onto the big screen. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Don Adams.

	Maxwell Smart returns. Bad idea.

questions.text: 'The French Lieutenant's Woman' is about as confusing as a movie can be. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
John Fowles.

	His novels are usually quite good - but this one wasn't. Neither was the movie. Meryl Streep starred.

questions.text: 'Ishtar' went nowhere. One of its stars was Warren Beatty; who was the other?
